name: AWAKENING
description:
Awakening : The Story of Elizabeth - a mystical first-person quest, a survival horror with great graphics and a frightening atmosphere.

The game takes place in a ghost town, which suddenly appears on the way of George Turner.
The protagonist drove this route hundreds of times, but this city he sees for the first time. How can that be, you ask?

The city in which there are no people, the city where every rustle can mean the approach of your death.
You have to become a participant of very mysterious events and unravel the tangle of mysteries and secrets in which you have been attracted by the ancient evil. Find out the story of the dead city and try to get out alive from this damn place.

Game features: 
- Immerse yourself in a frightening mystical atmosphere and experience a feeling of real fear.
- Collect a collection of mystical artifacts.
- A well-thought-out plot will dip you into an incredible story.
- Wonderful graphics and easy management.
- Interesting puzzles and intricate riddles.
- Atmospheric soundtrack and voice-over in Russian.
